desc: It is implied by the phenomenon of conversion that some words hold multiple parts of speech. That is to say, these multi-part-of-speech words might confuse the language models in terms of POS tagging. Accordingly, we replace adjectives with words holding multiple parts of speech.

examples.ori: `` That secrecy leads to a proposal like the one from Ways and Means , which seems to me sort of draconian , '' he said
examples.trans: `` That secrecy leads to a proposal like the one from Ways and Means , which seems to me sort of slick , '' he said

examples.ori: The complex financing plan in the S&L bailout law includes raising $ 30 billion from debt issued by the newly created RTC
examples.trans: The grownup financing plan in the S&L bailout law includes raising $ 30 billion from debt issued by the newly created RTC
